messages.message:
This modal has two different sizes of text, and it needs a couple edits:

Deleting app runs permanently removes associated output files, log directories, and database entries.

Delete source files?
---
@jack.robbins I'm not sure who worked on front end for this.
Note that the text I'm recommending^ doesn't need to be modified if there are one or many runs.
cc @tony.shi do you want to take this?
@tony.shi can you link the ticket for this work once you have it tracked

@melissa.amos, can you please link me to the two places where the font sizes are different? Thanks!

Also, it looks like we've flipped the bottom toggle to keep source files instead of deleting them. Is the current copy ok?
I think @melissa.amos means that the checkbox text and the body text within the same modal is different size.

@melissa.amos, how does this look?

The ticket for this is here (https://instabase.atlassian.net/browse/FLOW-10471) and the PR will be here (https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/65887)
Right right right, I knew we had looked at this, but I couldn't find the thread. I'll update and confirm wording recommendations in the ticket you created. Ty!
